ABOUT US

PT. EKANURI

Founded on the simple principle of delivering practical solution to our clients, especially in the oil & gas industries. Our system which is called the EKA NURI TOTAL SOLUTION is a comprehensive integrated solution between warehouses, transportation, manpower, and support, with professional management to professionally comply with each and every client's demand.

OUR CLIENTS

OUR SERVICES

Construction

PT. Eka Nuri provides construction service to companies who recognize the value of a partner who works diligently and creatively to find the best possible solution for each particular project. We have delivered the best value in building services by placing expert construction professionals on every project undertaken.

Container

PT. Eka Nuri container stacking yard is a 37,000 square meter site that is able to accomodate at least 3,700 TEUs (measurement unit of a single standard 20-foot container). With such a huge area, we can easily provide separate blocks for each customer under FIFO system.

Shipping

Best commitment to our customers would not be achieved without technology and professionalism. As the technology develops and makes changes to the world's behavior, professionalism is needed to adapt with the current trends.

Transportation

FLEXITANK A Flexitank is a bulk liquid container constructed from a woven nylon or polyester coated on both sides with syntthetic rubber or thermoplastic material with a capacity of up to 23 cubic metres. Dependent on the specific gravity of the liquid, this modern vehicle of intermodal transportation converts a standard 20' dry container into a bulk liquid container capable of carrying up to 21.5 tonnes of non-corrosive and non hazardous liquid product.

Warehouse

PT. Eka Nuri appreciates the value and importance, that our customers place on high quality warehousing facilities. As a result, we are continually evaluating our current facilities and upgrading them whenever necessary.In recent times, we have expanded our warehouse space and we have completely restructured the monitoring of our warehouse procedures to ensure security, facilitate tracking, handling and retrieval. We have also taken every possible precaution to safeguard your goods with a 24 hour security system as well as a firefighting system and strictly monitored pest control.Currently we have 5 warehouses located around Kali Japat, a small river in Tanjung Priok area - main harbour of the City of Jakarta.
